definition: Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
bay/gulf/to cast anchor/to moor (a boat)
meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young
see 仔肩[zi1 jian1]
variant of 崽[zai3]

sentences.english: It is a non-profit community art space, located in the revitalizing Blue House neighbourhood of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 灣仔視集爲一非牟利社區藝術空間，藍屋左鄰。

sentences.english: Can arrange pick up in Central or Wanchai consignment shop.
sentences.chinese: 可安排於中環或灣仔寄賣店交收。

sentences.english: Golden Hill Properties in Wanchai makes do with a storefront but no store.
sentences.chinese: 金山財產公司在灣仔區有一家店頭，卻沒有商店。

sentences.english: Provides community services for families and individuals in Wanchai district.
sentences.chinese: 爲灣仔區內居民及家庭提供社區服務。

sentences.english: This offer is only available at Wan Chai clinic of CCMC.
sentences.chinese: 此優惠只適用於康德堂灣仔診所。

sentences.english: Wanchai Ferry has always been my top choice.
sentences.chinese: 灣仔碼頭一直都是我的首選。

sentences.english: The shopping areas of Wan Chai and Causeway Bay are all within walking distances.
sentences.chinese: 灣仔購物區和銅鑼灣都只有步行距離。

sentences.english: Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, 5 Wan Shing Street, Wanchai, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 香港愛護動物協會，香港灣仔運盛街5號。

sentences.english: It is part of the existing pavements of Wanchai Road.
sentences.chinese: 屬灣仔道現有行人路的部分。

sentences.english: Phoenix Animal Clinic Limited, G/F, 67 Hennessy Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 皇后大道東獸醫診所，香港灣仔軒尼詩道67號地下。

sentences.english: Rehabilitation (of buildings), e. g. Blue House at Stone Nullah Lane in Wanchai.
sentences.chinese: 維修樓宇，例如灣仔石水渠街的藍屋。

sentences.english: Revitalization (of a district), e. g. Li Chit Street in Wanchai.
sentences.chinese: 翻新舊區，例如灣仔李節街。

sentences.english: However, you know the class for office property between Wanchai and Central or Admiralty is totally different.
sentences.chinese: 但是你知道灣仔和中環或金鐘的商業級數完全不同。

sentences.english: West and belong to the Wan Chai and HENGQIN Zhuhai look right.
sentences.chinese: 西與同屬珠海市的灣仔和橫琴對望。

sentences.english: However,you know the class for office property between Wan Chai and Central or Admiralty is totally different.
sentences.chinese: 但是你知道灣仔和中環或金鐘的商業級數完全不同。

sentences.english: Company is headquartered in Hong Kong, China, No. 250 Hennessy Road, Wan Chai.
sentences.chinese: 公司總部位於中國香港灣仔軒尼詩道250號。
